title: Kero Kero Keroppi no Christmas Eve no Okurimono
synopsis: A star who tries to act like an adult falls from the sky. Keroppi helps nurse it back to health and regain its confidence to shine once again.
related_anime: ['Kero Kero Keroppi no Boku-tachi no Takaramono', 'Kero Kero Keroppi no Gulliver no Bouken', 'Kero Kero Keroppi no Robin Hood', 'Kero Kero Keroppi no Bouken: Pink no Kinoko', 'Kero Kero Keroppi no Daibouken: Fushigi na Mame no Ki']
